name: Tow Truck Driver Car Fix 3D Simulator
name_original: Tow Truck Driver Car Fix 3D Simulator
description:
Play as skillful driver for wrecked cars in this challenging game Tow Truck Driver Car Fix 3D Simulator. People’s cars damaged and breakdown on highway or city streets they are calling for emergency towing trucker service. Bus parked wrong or damaged in road accident or plane gets breakdown on runway before takeoff. Gear up to drive big trucks with thrilling towing experience. No more need to join driving school for parking test or license. Enhance your driving skills like pro in this extreme thrilling simulation game.


Drive with precision and perfection to avoid more accidents and crashes. Download Tow Truck Driver Car Fix 3D Simulator game in your tablet and phone for endless fun and entertainment.


Features:


2 Cool puller trucks
10 Challenging game levels
Amazing city and airport locations
Smooth touch screen controls
High definition graphics
Challenging gameplay
Superb background sounds
